title: Please fix the surrender vote
body:
I really cannot stand being stuck in a game that has turned to crap with two ass holes on the team who keep voting no. 

They always say "but we can still win". Who cares if you think you can win. I am not trying to surrender because I think we are going to lose. I am trying to surrender because I am not having fun playing with trolling ass holes on my team. 

How can you play a team game of five with three people not having fun and wanting to quit? How is it fair that two jerks can hold everyone else in a game the other three do not want to play? This does not make any sense. 

- Lower the number of votes needed from 4 to 3.
- Lower the minimum timer from 20 minutes to 15. Actually 10 would be better since most trolls do not waste any time to destroy a game. 

This has absolutely nothing to do with whether you can still win or not. It is a simple matter of removing yourself from a toxic situation before things get worse.
